blueprint_book.label: Auxiliary Block Blueprints
blueprint_book.description:
Based on Brian's Trains "Aux" Stations:
https://factorioprints.com/view/-M5PZvxZVXEZnmg4V7Hy

Low-UPS designs that requires additional mods:
- Loader Redux
- Merging Chests
- Merging Chests Unlimited
with startup settings using IRON chests, allowing 150 wide/high,150  max area, and 1000 max slots.

Visit above page for direct links to those mods.
